featured_article.title: Computer says NO to HTML5 document outline
featured_article.text: What a brilliant idea! For the longest time HTML5 specified, and advised developers, that it no longer mattered what the number (1 to 6) was in a heading element (when used in conjunction with sectioningelements). What mattered was the nesting level of the H1-h6 in sectioning elements, just like the XHTML promised land, but […]
